titleStmt.title: A breefe of scripture disproving the principall points of popery / gathered by J.W. for the use of the people of his owne charge.
titleStmt.author: Waker, John.

publicationStmt.date: Imprinted Anno Dom. cIc. Ic. c.xxiiii.

notesStmt.note: Publisher and place suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Second and third letters "c" in date are printed in reverse.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
